tags.name: Arbtur Fischer Catholic Primary and Junior High School
Freeman Methodist Primary A and B Schools

tags.addr:full: P. O. Box MC 319 Takoradi, Ghana
tags.name: Forsbridge International School
Aboadze Abuesi DA Primary School C

tags.description: St. John’s school was founded as a private SHS by the Roman Catholic Church on 29th January, 1952. It was the first secondary school to be established in the Western region.
tags.name: St. John's School

tags.description: The school was established on 9th August, 1909 by the colonial government as a pure Technical school, providing a 3-year course in Wood work and Metal work. The school is the first Secondary Technical School in the country.
tags.name: Ghana Senior High/Technical School
Seventh-day Adventist Church Primary & JHS, Takoradi

tags.description: The School was established in 1947 by the Catholic Church. It is located in the Ahanta West District and purely a Boys’ School.
tags.name: St. Mary's Boys' Senior High School

tags.description: The school was established and absorbed by GES in October, 1990 through the initiatives of the district assembly, district and regional directorates of education and the chiefs and people of Mpohor traditional area.
tags.name: Mpohor Senior High School

tags.description: The school is a Catholic institution founded by His Grace Archbishop John Kokwo Amissah within the Ghana Public Education system. We welcome girls of all religious denominations. Archbishop Porter Girls’ SHS is sited on a hill in Fijai, Takoradi.
tags.name: Archbishop Porter Girls' Senior High School

tags.description: The school was commissioned by the Paramount Chief of Essikado, Nana Kobina Nketsiah IV on the 29th of January, 1952 with thirty-eight (38) students, thirty-two (32) boys and six (6) girls.
tags.name: Fijai Senior High School

tags.description: The school is located in the Western Region of Ghana, situated in the regional capital of Sekondi. It is sited on a plateau overlooking the three surrounding communities of Arhinkofikrom, Ketan and Kojokrom.
tags.name: Ahantaman Girls' Senior High School

tags.description: Our mission is to provide quality education within a nurturing environment through maintaining an active partnership, enhancing monitoring and supervision of staff and students for academic excellence.
tags.name: Baidoo Bonso Senior High/Technical School

tags.description: Takoradi Technical Institute’s vision is to be second to none in the production of middle-level manpower for industry and self-employment.
tags.name: Takoradi Technical Institute

tags.description: The school was established in 1951 by Mr. Joseph W. Acquah at Essaman Ekuasi. Currently, the population of the school stands at 2,740 comprising of 1135 males and 1597 females.
tags.name: Sekondi College

tags.description: Adiembra Senior High School is a community Senior High School which was established in 1991. It is located in Adiembra township near Sekondi in the Sekondi/Takoradi Metropolis.
tags.name: Adiembra Senior High School

tags.description: The school was founded in 1985. It was an experimental J.H.S which was converted into a Senior High Technical School and named Bompeh Senior High Technical School.
tags.name: Bompeh Senior High/Technical School

tags.description: Our mission is to give the students matchless practical skills which will enable them fit well into any society in which they will find themselves.
tags.name: Diabene Senior High/Technical School

tags.description: Methodist Senior High was established in 1984 as a private secondary vocational school by the Wesley Methodist Church to enroll the teeming teenage girls roaming on the streets of the twin city into the mainstream secondary education.
tags.name: Methodist Senior High School-Sekondi

tags.description: Sankor SHS is a new Day Senior High School established in 2017 at Agona Nkwanta. The school is an E-Block school located in the Ahanta West District of the Western Region of Ghana, on the way from Agona Nkwanta to Dixcove.
tags.name: Sankor Community Day Senior High School

tags.description: Takoradi Senior High School is a co-educational institute which was established in 1958. It is located in West Tanokrom in the Sekondi-Takoradi Metropolis.
tags.name: Takoradi Senior High School
